stories.title: Federal Bank
stories.headline: Federal Bank is one of Indias fastest growing mid-size banks.
stories.body: It has a customer base of over 8 million customers and handles almost 15 percent of Indias inbound overseas remittances. With more than 1200 branches, 1600 ATMs, and over 11,000 employees.

stories.title: TTK Healthcare
stories.headline: TTK Healthcare is a leading provider in India of products aimed at improving quality of life for customers
stories.body: The companys products span personal care, baby care, pharmaceuticals, and advanced medical devices, such as heart valves. The company previously moved their on-premises Oracle E-Business Suite to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure in the Frankfurt.

stories.title: Sky
stories.headline: Sky is the largest satellite pay TV operator in Brazil.
stories.body: Sky tailors entertainment closely to the trends and interests of Brazilians as they learn, connect, and play.

stories.title: CERN
stories.headline: CERN, the European Organization for Nuclear Research.
stories.body: Oracle and CERN have been collaborating for over 35 years with on-premises software and systems to solve challenging problems
